# Curse of Impending Blades, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Bard Spells|Bard 3]], [[3rd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Targets:** Enemies in a 20-ft.-radius burst

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 56

This spell functions like *[[Curse of Impending Blades (Spell)|curse of impending blades]],* except that it affects multiple enemies.
